original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.16. Hetuduka, Maggārammaṇattika🔽Hetuṁ maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu duka magga ārammaṇa ttika  hetum magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)🔽Hetuṁ maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi 🔽hetum magga adhipatim dhammam paṭicca na hetu na magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
